description:
Meagan Read & the Meagan Read Property Team Proudly present to the market 41 Borrowdale Court, Mundoolun. Situated in the highly sought-after acreage Mundoolun Estate. This 1.5 + acreage property provides a place where nature meets modern comfortable living.
Lined with bushland this property's location will take your breath away!
This unique pole home with polished timber floors provides a life of luxury with all the modern features, set back from the road in an ideal location there is so much privacy on offer.
Inside there is so much to love about this home with soaring ceilings amplifying the tree-lined views and the spacious modern open plan design that will suit the whole family's needs. The spacious bedrooms all offer built in robes & ceiling fans, walk in robe and en suite to the master suite, with glass sliding doors opening out to the rear deck, a beautiful place to enjoy your morning coffee whilst taking in the abundance of wildlife right at your back door.
The central kitchen offers an enormous amount of storage/cupboard space with quality appliances, 900ml country gas cooker, dishwasher, Caesar stone bench tops, all with lovely rural bush views from your kitchen window. Step outside to the deck area & enjoy entertaining with family & friends over a casual barbeque, with pull down external blinds to enjoy out-door living all year round.
The owners have loved living here and will miss the wildlife & birdlife, fresh veggies from the veggie garden, an array of fruit/citrus trees in the orchard & of course the fresh eggs that their free-range chickens supply.
Underneath the home will accommodate several cars, plus storage room, there is also a shed which would make a great workshop, extra car accommodation, or more storage space.
Private, peaceful location with nothing to do but move in and enjoy, this is a property not to be missed! Contact Meagan on 0421 555 920 to arrange your private inspection today.

What's to love about this home:
* 4 spacious bedrooms, master suite with en-suite, and walk in robe.
* 2 Brand new air-conditioners, S/C wood heater for all year-round comfort.
* Polished timber floors.
* Multiple living areas.
* 900ml country gas cooker.
* Mountain views from your windows.



Outside Features:
* 6 x water tanks total capacity 96,000 litres, trickle feed water, new filtration system.
* Veggie plot, Established Orchard, dam re-dug 12 months ago.
* 1.5 KLW solar, solar Hot Water, chicken coup.
* Veranda’s front & rear to enjoy the peaceful setting.

The Location:
45 mins to Brisbane CBD, & 50 mins Drive to Gold Coast.
Under 10 mins to the Jimboomba Township, with a choice of excellent local schools, Coles/Woolworths, specialty shops, Cafes/Restaurants, medical centres, parks & sporting grounds.
Rates approximately $2000.00 per year.
